synopsis.text: The special forces, Black Star Squad, led by Yao Yuan, embark on a mission to save humanity from the impending doom caused by neutron star fragments threatening Earth. Aboard the spaceship Hope, they set off on a cosmic journey to find a new home for a large group of survivors in the vast universe. As they venture into the unknown, they encounter advanced cosmic civilizations and awaken the power of space adaptors, marking the beginning of a new era in the macrocosm. However, they soon discover that the universe is not the paradise they had hoped for, but a dark and dangerous realm filled with death and terror. Will they be able to find a new home and ensure the survival of mankind? Join Yao Yuan and his team on their thrilling and perilous journey through space and time.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
